nodes.text: During the waning years of the Galactic Republic, the military officer Rast'tul maintained a house in a residential district of the planet Thaere Privo. During the Clone Wars, Rast'tul kidnapped the child Night Wren and took her to live with him in his house, using her as a pawn to manipulate her mother, Senator Lavina Wren of the Galactic Republic. However, in about 20 BBY, the Heroes of Cularin—a band of freelance agents from the Cularin system—broke into the house and rescued Night.
